com.deepak.recentfilesapi

Class FileIconTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deepak.recentfilesapi.FileIconTypes

  • public class FileIconTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    this class provides methods for specifying icons for file types which will be used by the RecentFileManger for setting the JMenuItem icon for a particular file type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileIconTypes(java.lang.String fileType, javax.swing.ImageIcon icon)
      creates a FileIconType

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileIconTypes

        public FileIconTypes(java.lang.String fileType,
             javax.swing.ImageIcon icon)
        creates a FileIconType
        Parameters:
        fileType - the file extension. set empty string ("") for setting default icon
        icon - the icon associated with the specified file extension
